item.title: Recipe of the week: Freshly baked MacBook Pro
item.description: A panicked friend came to me yesterday with a broken 15â€³ MacBook Pro (Early 2008). I sat the thing down on my desk and hit the power button. The hard drive & disk drive made a bit of noise, the power light glowed faintly then CLUNK and it was off again. No glowing Apple, no hope of booting to Recovery Mode. He repeatedly mentioned that it “must be a hard disk issue” so I swiftly replaced it, in the back of my mind knowing it was unlikely to fix anything.
